title: Bug 49536: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps are deployed
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
EB: I expect that when no webapps are deployed, accessing a URL should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apache-tomcat-7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL and observe the response
